GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v4.14.286
GSD.description:
iio: trigger: sysfs: fix use-after-free on remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.286 by commit fd5d8fb298a2866c337da635c79d63c3afabcaf7, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit f38bc926d022ebd67baad6ac7fc22c95fbc6238c. For more details please see the references link.
